description: Sit in the Peaceful Garden of the Chickadee Cottage in LoHi
host_id:
Enjoy the famous Colorado weather and unplug in indoor & outdoor living.
Our charming guesthouse has a serene ambiance throughout every area.
Spread out on the L-shaped sofa while relaxing, reading or playing a game.
Spend a sunny afternoon out on the hammock or enjoying the garden parlor sofa, or sink into the shared hot tub.
We are located next to downtown and in the neighborhood of lower highlands, check out our favorite neighborhood attraction the Bug Theater!
Short walks to Superb coffee shops, restaurants & micro brews, distilleries, dispensary & downtown. UVC w/ Ozone sterilization.

description: Comfortable  - and a great value!
host_id:
Large guest room in my home, where I also live. I have breakfast foods for nightly* guests to help themselves to. If 3 people share this room, one sleeps on the couch in the room.

*as opposed to weekly or monthly. Weekly and monthly guests are also welcome to help themselves to breakfast food their first of couple of days.

The space
I have been enjoying welcoming many wonderful guests into my home for 11+ years now with Airbnb (from 34 different countries so far.)

Please have a bit of info about yourself in your Airbnb profile. (Hover over the tiny picture of yourself in the very top, right corner and Edit Profile will be one of the options that pop up. Be sure to scroll down and hit the red SAVE button)

In this guest room there is a queen-sized bed, couch, wifi, desk with computer you may use, also some closet and drawer space. Must share bathroom with me, (or use basement bath) but my time is now flexible since I retired

description: private
host_id:
This room is in the basement. It does not have its own entrance, but is fairly private. Please read the full room description (water bed, hearing footsteps above.) I want my guests to be happy and have no surprises.

The space
This is a basement room. You can sometimes hear when people are walking around up above. It has a super-single-sized water bed. It's 48" wide x 80" long. 48" wide is 9 inches wider than a single bed, and 6 inches narrower than a double. 80" long is the same as a queen-size bed)

I think it only accommodates one person, but people ask all the time to put two in there, so I allow it. You must be very friendly to both sleep in that bed together. Clean and nice bathroom is next door. Of course I provide soap, clean towels and probably will have anything else you might have forgotten or not wanted to pack so you can just have carry-on luggage. We are close to Steam Espresso, Platt Park Brewing, Sushi Den, Kaos Pizza, Old Pearl Street and DU/University of Denver - great for 1, 2 or 3 couples, families, and business travelers.

The space
We have a spacious contemporary impeccably renovated home in Platt Park - one of Denver's best, most delightful, most accessible neighborhoods.
The main home has living, dining, and entertainment areas and a gourmet chef kitchen. A private courtyard with outdoor dining and a gas grill is accessible right off the dining room weather permitting. French press, tried and true Mr. Coffee brewer, and teapot and kettle.

description: Queen en suite in lovely Victorian
host_id:
Beautiful Victorian House next to Denver Botanic Gardens, historic houses, big trees, 3 parks, but also close to nightlife! We provide organic breakfast items, including GF bread; and high quality shampoos/conditioners sans parabens.
2.5 miles to downtown Denver, & 1 block from the bus or bikes that can take you there.
Walking distance: Restaurants, market, coffee shop, Cheesman Park & City Park, Zoo, Museum of Nature and Science. Free on street parking out front.

The space
Queen bedroom with full private bathroom (en suite) and a very comfortable, extra-deep pillow-top mattress, extra pillows. In the summer, we have a hammock, big shade trees, a gas grill, a large organic garden, and 8 "urban chickens" (no roosters!). In the winter, we have a fire pit under the pergola to drink wine or hot chocolate beside. Or, you can have your wine curled up in front of the wood fireplace in the living room.

description: Stapleton Carriage House
host_id:
Private 1 bedroom / 1 bath carriage house apartment fully furnished with private entrance, full kitchen, full bath, fireplace, washer/dryer and a balcony with gas grill in walkable neighborhood close to transit. We primarily rent the unit medium term in the 3 week to 3 month range.

The space
This 700 square foot apartment is all yours. We live in the main house on the property and are pleased to have you as our guest.

Guest access
The carriage is located over our detached garage with a private entrance off the alley. A code will be provided for the keypad lock once the reservation is confirmed. Contact us if you have any issues with receiving or using the code.

Other things to note
Parking is available on the street. There is space to store 1 or 2 bicycles, however no garage access is provided. TV is provided by DirecTV. Free Wifi.

2017-BFN-0000476

description: Private apt in Berkeley, MTN Views!
host_id:
The space
Beautiful two bedroom apartment in an historic mansion designed by Denver architect, Jacques Jules Benedict, who designed the Western White House. In the Berkeley neighborhood of Denver.

Spoil yourself at the exclusive Berkeley Suite. Located in the Highlands and Berkeley, just minutes by car or bike from downtown and Highlands Square. Privacy, white linens and hand-picked, antique-enhanced decor welcome you home for a memorable stay. Full kitchen, open plan and warm wood floors...will please the most discerning guests. Second story windows add wonderful flowing natural light and great views of the mountains. Your stay at the Berkeley Suite will be punctuated with relaxation and sophistication. Come & go as you please. No other guests to invade your privacy. Indulge in the quiet of the Denver morning by taking your breakfast in the flower filled patios or walk to any number of wonderful coffee shops, boutiques or galleries. Experience Northwest Denver

description: Sweet and sunny in Capitol Hill
host_id:
Large bedroom featuring private bath, comfortable queen bed/w/eider down duvet in a quiet, sunny, Victorian house in Capitol Hill. Located 15 blocks from Downtown, 1-3 blocks from 3 bus routes, 10 minutes from Cherry Creek & major highways.

The space
I only open this room when the other airbnb room I have is occupied and in the event that two requests come in at the same time and there is an overlap of only a few days. To see pictures of the house and for a further description, please refer to "Private Suite in Capitol Hill"

Guest access
Guests are welcome to use the common areas of the house, the kitchen, living room and dining room. All bedrooms are considered private and off-limits. The other area of the house that is private and off-limits is my studio in the back of the house.

description: Suite of rooms in Capitol Hill
host_id:
I have a suite of rooms in a Victorian house in Capitol Hill one block from Cheesman Park. The house is located 15 blocks from downtown Denver, approximately 1 1/2 miles from Cherry Creek, 4 blocks from St. Joseph's Hospital. One block from 2 major bus routes.

The space
The house is a charming Victorian with a sunny southern exposure, hardwood floors throughout and a wood-burning fireplace.

The suite is furnished with: in the main room, a full size bed, 2 bedside tables, a desk and chair, a bookshelf, and in the closet for the room, a sink and commode. In the adjoining alcove are: a large chest of drawers, an armchair, a small round table and 2 chairs, a sofa that folds out into a bed and a small walk-in closet with overhead light. Many of my guests have commented that they like having a sink in the room. I have a second listing which could also be made available during peak times, or if there are a number of you in your party. description: Two-Story Open Condo with GREAT Outdoor Rooftop!
host_id:
Welcome to our home! We love our space and are thrilled to share our gem in the heart of the city with you. Enjoy open spaces, a luxury kitchen and bathrooms, a master suite to die for and a rooftop that will make you feel at peace in the city!

The space
This 2 bedroom/2 bath condo takes the top 2 floors in a Victorian home in the heart of Denver's cap hill neighborhood. Less than a mile from downtown one direction, Cheeseman park in the other, the location can't be beat! Tons of space with a dream chef's kitchen, huge master suite that covers the entire top floor, stunning massage shower with rainfall shower head and a large rooftop to enjoy the Denver sunshine. Open living space and a gas fireplace make this airy condo a great space to spend time. Tons of restaurants, bars, parks, the Colorado state Capitol, and a Whole Foods within walking distance. Right in the center of everything.

This 1892 brick, Whittier neighborhood home is an historic landmark. The home is decorated with artistic treats from world travels. It is a great home base for you to experience all Colorado has to offer!

Cannabis friendly polished one bedroom/one bath garden apartment is your home to explore downtown Denver! Bedroom has a queen size bed. Living room has a sofa bed (futon) to sleep one more comfortably, big open space and elegant dining table for four.
3/4 bath (standing shower) is split with private commode, huge sink/vanity area and shower.
Fully equipped with two HDTVs with Amazon Fire Sticks for Netflix and Hulu, high speed wifi, washer/dryer and a great open kitchen.

The space
This Historic Row House was built in 1889 and is designated as a historic landmark as part of the Clements District. It is one of the few examples of the Italianate architectural style in Denver.

description: Oasis in the middle of the City - Spacious Bedroom
host_id:
My place is a balance of easy hospitality, great location and a unique "oasis" yard. It is close to the Univ. of Denver, Observatory Park, University Hills, and the Colorado Light rail station. This ranch house is a good spot for solo and business travelers, new arrivals and those who want something a little different. My home is a great reprieve from the bustle of the city but very convenient to accessing everything. I have been hosting for 3 years, but recently opened this room for you.

The space
The main bedroom is at the far end of the house. It is open and bright with a desk for working with fast internet.
There is a walk-in closet with shelves and lots of space to spread out. The private bathroom is quaint and a fabulous mid-century modern experience. Please note: the shower is small.

Guest access
Please be respectful and quiet when coming and going in the house. The living room is open to enjoy with the cats and other humans.

Two super comfortable bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms. The upstairs bedroom has a comfy queen-sized mattress with a full bath and skylight. The downstairs bedroom has a fabulous memory-foam mattress, situated in a cute little lofted "bed cave" (trademark pending) with a 3/4 bath. The garden-level room also has a chaise lounge which is perfect for curling up and reading a book.

description: Spacious, bright and beautiful home in RiNo
host_id:
Enjoy the spacious luxury of our contemporary, renovated 1886 home. Perfect for couples, business travelers, and small families. Full bathrooms for each bedroom (king & queen size beds). Modern kitchen opens to a back patio/BBQ. Ecofriendly low scent products used. Located in the popular Curtis Park/RiNo area- home to breweries, good food, good drinks, coffee shops. Central area in Denver-easy access to major highways, 10 min Coors Field and Mission Ballroom, 25 min to Red Rocks .

The space
Recently renovated 1886 home in the oldest and coolest area of Denver - we love sharing our home and neighborhood with travelers. The house was designed to maximize private space and enjoyment and maximum outdoor time. It's more spacious in person. The deck on the front is perfect for morning coffee, any-time drinks, or watching the day roll back. The kitchen is equipped with new appliances (gas stove/oven, dishwasher) and opens up to a patio area complete with a BBQ.

host_id:
Airy, bright and thoughtfully appointed garden carriage house just minutes away from one of Denver's hottest downtown neighborhoods, RiNo. This newly constructed apartment boasts mountain views with the convenience of city living and a casual neighborhood vibe for those who want to live like a local while visiting Denver.

The second story apartment with private secured parking is 30 minutes from DIA by car or off the RTD A Line. Access to RiNo is a 30 minute walk on the new 39th Ave Greenway.

The space
We built this house so our friends and family would have a place of their own when they came to visit. We're happy to open up our home to you too!

description: Cozy apartment in a great central location

This is a garden level apartment with plenty of light. The building has an awesome yard and is walking distance to the light rail and many of Denver's coolest spots.

It's walking distance to the hip Rino arts district and downtown, close to City Park with the history museum and zoo, and close to the highways to get to the mountains or other parts of the city.

There is a b-cycle station down the street to rent bikes and scooter sharing is always close by.

description: Baldwin Piano Loft - City Center/Downtown Denver
host_id:
Imagine floor-to-ceiling windows designed to move grand pianos through! The Baldwin Piano Loft combines Denver’s only remaining cast iron façade with the modern comforts of a stylish urban industrial loft in 800 square feet of space on Denver’s vibrant 16th Street Mall a stone’s throw from transport, shopping, bars & restaurants, and Denver’s urban Target

The space
The Baldwin Piano Loft is not only unique in downtown Denver, it is unique within the building! In 1998, the 100-year-old Baldwin piano factory was converted into modern lofts with individual owner input on layout. The Baldwin offered everything from piano sales to lessons, and its cast-iron façade was required to support the enormous windows through which pianos were moved in and out of the upper floors (that's right, the pianos falling on people's heads on Bugs Bunny were an actual threat in the early 20th century!). host_id:

If you wish to travel to another location in Denver, public transportation is across the street (buses) or within walking distance (light rail).

The space

description: West Highland - Charming Apt in Historic Home
host_id:
A gorgeous basement apartment in a Denver Square home built in 1890 and tastefully renovated to maintain the home's original charm. One block to 32nd and Lowell historic neighborhood with cute shops, cafes and restaurants; it's a super hip neighborhood that is quiet, safe but also very fun. There is also an AirBnB in the main house so you should expect to hear some noise from the guests above you. Soundproof insulation helps dampen most sounds such as walking but does not eliminate it.

The space
We recently renovated the garden level apartment in this gorgeous home with modern touches and comfortable spaces for a couple or single traveler. Enjoy evening on the private flagstone patio with a glass of wine and cook a meal on the charcoal barbecue. The apartment is set up for two people to work (includes two desks and 1GB internet speed) comfortably, make a lovely meal in the gourmet kitchen or enjoy lots of restaurant options just a block or two away.

description: Hip Location- RiNo
host_id:
An arts and culture district of the first order, River North (RiNo) has an industrial vibe that comes through in the many old, historic warehouses and factories that now house a number of hopping bars, restaurants, galleries and music venues. “You’ll find it in the street murals that seem to pop up overnight, in the experimental galleries that play open house on Friday nights, and in the innovative food halls and rockabilly microbrews that play host to the city’s young, bold and tattooed,”

The space
Cozy and clean with an espresso machine -local beans provided. Full Cable line up, HBO, Showtime, and AppleTV.

Guest access
Tap room, fitness center, business center, pool table, hot tub and year round access to the pool.

Our turn of the century home is located in the Historic Baker neighborhood, nestled between the Santa Fe Arts District and South Broadway. We are within walking distance to shops, cafes and some of the best restaurants in Denver! Jump on the light rail or cab to Union Station in 10 minutes. We are located just off 6th Ave - a straight shot to the mountains. Our place is ideal for anyone looking to stay centrally located in the heart of colorful, eclectic Baker!

The space
The entire home and yard will be for the private use of our guests. We do live in the home and rent it while we are away. We have 3 bedrooms, one of the bedrooms is regularly an office/yoga space, which is equipped with a queen size foam floor mattress. We could also accommodate a sleeper on the living room couch.

description: 50% off monthly, Superlative property
host_id:
This 5 bedroom (6 with the treehouse, the nicest you will see), 3 bathroom home is in the Witter-Cofield historic district surrounded by Victorian houses. It has a large open kitchen and hardwood floors. Nice, big backyard with a big fire pit and lots of outdoor seating. Both Master bedrooms are quite large and the Master bathroom is very nice. Off-street parking, Super close to downtown and all that Denver has to offer. Most remodeling is recent, new appliances, very spacious and modern.

The space
Five bedrooms, six with the Treehouse. There are two Master bedrooms with king beds - one upstairs and one downstairs. Three bedrooms with queen beds and two click-clack sleeper sofas. There is a big fire pit in the backyard, and barbeque grill.

For larger groups please visit the link for the adjacent property. https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/15869291?s=51

description: The Wish Room in Congress Park
host_id:
This amazing light-filled house has a charming guest room. Perfect for the female solo traveler or couple looking for a quiet and comfortable place to stay. Located in the sweetest, most neighborly~neighborhood in Denver.

My pets make it a lively and cozy home with one cats and a small yorkie-poodle puppy. You can have peace and quiet, good conversation, or be mostly out and about. The dinning room table makes for a great work space and I'm usually open to co-collaborating meals.

The space
My home is quiet and serene with a loving dog and two cats.

The neighborhood is warm and welcoming. People walk their dogs throughout the day along our house and say hi.

Vegetable garden beds are growing in the back yard. Weekly farm share brings in additional fresh produce.

Kitchen has all the amenities for clean organic eating. Vitamix blender, food processor, super angel juicer, dehydrator, etc.

I'm an excellent cook

description: Spacious 4 bedroom house great for families.
host_id:
The is a 4 bedroom 2 1/2 bath house in a wonderful area close to the city. Pools, 2 town centers with restaurants in walking distance. Fully stocked with dishes, pots/pants, coffee, tea, linens, all the random things, fire pit, porch swing and rockers. Enjoy!

The space
While you are visiting you will have access to the entire house, garage, porch, backyard, fire pit...all of it. The house is completely stocked. No need to get coffee filters, condiments, spices, towels, hair dryers, shampoo, etc. It’s all here for your use.

Other things to note
There are 2 cats there full time.

Beautiful 1910 brick house in Denver's hottest neighborhood, 2 blocks from Sloan's Lake. Master bedroom (queen bed), full bath, dining room, living room, kitchen and bedroom/office(double bed) on the main floor. 2 additional bedrooms (single beds), grotto bath, laundry room, and secondary living area in the newly finished basement. Our house is comfortable for 6 adults max, or up to 8 (i.e. 4 adults and 4 kids).

description: Welcome to the York Street Speakeasy!
host_id:
Lovely garden level basement apartment, newly remodeled in a 1904 historic home located in the Wyman Historic District. Walking distance to 3 major parks, dining, coffee shops, Denver Botanic Gardens, or take a Lyft 10 min to Downtown or even closer to the Cherry Creek district. Buses are also half a block away. We would be happy to tell you more about the surrounding areas and our favorite hangouts. We used as much reclaimed material as possible to craft this speakeasy-style space.

The space
Parking can be tricky, but no problem during the day and always a spot available within a couple of blocks. You can load your stuff in through the alley for easy access, and the entrance is on the north side of the building and dedicated to your space. PLEASE watch your head coming down the stairs, it's low clearance!

description: The Henry Lee House—A Denver Landmark in LoHi Neighborhood
host_id:
Fully remodeled in 2018 and redesigned in 2020 specifically for large group stays of 14+. Come visit Denver's booming LoHi neighborhood. Walking distance to the best bars and restaurants in Denver, 1.5 miles to the heart of downtown. Rustic charm combined with modern comfort. Perfect for large parties, weddings and events! Message us with questions and rates for events!

host_id:
This house is a 30 day minimum rental.

This high-end, well appointed historic home has been recently renovated to comfortably sleep 9. The Capital Hill location is perfect for anyone looking to experience the best of Denver's downtown living!

Need more room? Inquiry about renting the carriage house located on the property. You'll be able to comfortably fit another 3 guests. Inquiry with the property manager.

The space
The home was built over 100 years ago and many of the upgrades have been made in accordance with the historic location and design of the original home, but with all modern amenities. All bedrooms are replete with beautiful appointments, including high-end sheets and linens.

The backyard has a grill and table/chairs. The backyard is filled with wild flowers and tends to have an 'over-grown' feel...please keep that in mind before booking.

There is a foldout full couch as well as a 21" tall queen air mattress. We also have a Pack n Play for your little one! description: Historic Potter Highlands Barn
host_id:
Walk to Coors Field, Pepsi Center, Mile High Stadium, Union Station and downtown Denver! Short drive to the Stock Show Complex and Mission Ballroom. Easy access to I-70, I-25 and US 36.Two-story restored barn in the hip Highlands area. Dozens of restaurants and bars are within walking distance of this historic Potter Highlands barn in a quiet, tree-lined neighborhood. Fun sleeping nook for children. Cable tv, internet, heat, air conditioning, and minimalist kitchen.

The space
Our small Victorian home and the original barn in the Potter Highlands area of Denver were built in 1902. We were recently visited by a 92 year-old woman who lived in our home during her childhood. She said she enjoyed climbing up the ladder and playing in the "haymow" that is now the upstairs bedroom. This is a one of a kind place. Also, an easy walk to so many great places you'll need a month to get everything in!

We are excited to invite your doggies to join...$5 per pet per day. I love traveling with my pup and bet others do too. (So sorry, kitties not allowed due to allergies)

Almost everything you could need (groceries, bars, art, restaurants, the convention center, museums) is within a 10 minute walk of the house.

The house also includes a two car garage, and all access is automated with coded locks.

description: Private 3Br-Comfy and Convenient Art District Home
host_id:
Welcome to my Art District Farmhouse! This home was built in 1900, and lovingly restored in 2017. The cozy living room, kitchen, and dining area are great for families and small groups. With 3 separate bedrooms and two bathrooms you will have the privacy you need for your Denver getaway. This property is exceptionally walk-able/bike-able to anything in the downtown area - Capital Hill, Convention Center, Arts District, Pepsi Center...and more! I look forward to your visit!

The space
This home has been set up for your comfort and convenience. Whether a group of 2 or a group of 6, you will have everything you need for your stay in Denver. I provide complimentary coffee and tea in the kitchen, which is also fully set up should you decide to cook. There are two queen sized beds in private rooms, and a third daybed in a room of it's own that can sleep as a single twin size bed, or pull out into a king size bed. Lots of options, I hope you enjoy!

You will absolutely love this historic carriage house. In many alleys, you can still find "turn-arounds" where the carriages did just that!

description: The High St. SpeakEasy
host_id:
The High St. SpeakEasy is a gathering place for people wanting to relax and experience Denver's best attractions.
It’s a 113 yr old home in centrally located neighborhood, with uniquely antique and modern finishes, very near the Denver Zoo, Museum of Natural History, City Park, multiple legendary live music venues, and countless restaurants and bars.
It’s also a quick Uber or scooter ride downtown, and next-door to the hottest district in Denver: RINO, and as always the infamous Colfax Ave.

The space
Inside are 4 floors of eclectic mixes of old Denver with 100-yr-old original woodwork, built-ins, hardwood floors, and a fireplace coupled with the touches of an art loft, modern structural architecture, updated appliances, and very unique spaces. The house has 3 large bedrooms, with the basement bedroom having and attached 2nd living area and mini-music lounge.
There is a sound system on every floor connected to Alexa, so play any song, anywhere,

host_id:
We've tried to think of everything to make your stay as comfortable and relaxing as possible. From our two master suites to our tempurpedic and posturepedic beds, we want you to leave more rejuvenated than when you arrived. Our home sleeps 13, and is located in the desired central part of Stapleton.

City and County of Denver License # 2020-BFN-0001196

The space
Rejuvenate yourself with a great workout in your own private gym, and then recover in the sauna or hot tub, or both! Your getaway also comes complete with dual master bedrooms, (each with a king bed) and two additional guest rooms (each with a queen bed). A king size air mattress is available for the 5th bedroom upon request. Every bedroom has it's own bathroom, so you will have complete privacy. The living room has two electric reclining leather couches, and the master bedroom also has an oversized couch. We have 4 porches that consist of two additional couches and two porch swings. description: Stay @ The "ARTBNB" One Of Denver's Coolest Homes!
host_id:
The Artbnb is a one of a kind place to stay. Decorated with a collection of beautiful artwork and unique furniture, you are sure to feel at home during you time here. The house is smack in the middle of Uptown/City Park West Neighborhood in Denver and is a short walk, bike or car ride to all Denver has to offer. Four blocks away is 17th ave - Denver's "restaurant row" which has many of Denver Local's favorite places to eat and drink. Come stay at the Artbnb and enjoy the Mile High lifestyle!

The space
In the gold mining days of Denver this house was built in 1893. Boasting 3 bedrooms all on the second floor, between the bedrooms the house has a gorgeous marble bath with his and her sinks and a stand up rain shower. The first floor bath has a large victorian claw foot bath tub for your soaking enjoyment. Each room is uniquely painted and the entire house is decorated with a contemporary art collection. description: Unbeatable location - HUGE 1 Br 1.5 Ba luxury Loft
host_id:
You won't find any 1 BR condos this spacious in Downtown Denver. 15' ceilings and huge windows will have you feeling comfortable and stylish your whole stay. Grocery, restaurant, Convention Center, bars, shopping, dispensaries, starbucks, and more all less than a 5 minute walk from the front door. Literally best location ever (check the reviews). I am constantly upgrading this place making it better all the time. Just installed brand new big screen TV's and some new art for example.

description: A Denver Home As Fresh as the Colorado Air
host_id:
Beautifully remodeled home in the Ruby Hill neighborhood. New carpet throughout with the exception of the kitchen and bathroom that has new tile. Modern kitchen with shaker white, soft close cabinets, glass tile backsplash and stainless steel appliances. Walking distance to Ruby Hill Park, public transportation as well as groceries stores. 12mins/$15 to downtown, 10mins/$10 to Mile High and Pepsi center via uber. Under 30 minutes to Red Rocks Amphitheater (Highly recommended).

Guest access
Guest will have the complete main floor of the house, starting with private patio off main front door entrance. Guest are encouraged to park right in front of the house. The back of the house including back yard, garage and shed will be off limits as well as the kitchen door between the sink and fridge.

Other things to note
Sprinklers come on every three days at 9pm.

description: 1890s Artistic Retreat Downtown w/Spa Bath 420: )
host_id:
Designed to feel like a 420: ) boutique hotel, the space features luxe decor, a premier queen bed, deep clawfoot tub and separate rain shower. Across the hall, there's a mini fridge, microwave, and coffee bar.

It's easy to order in from Denver's best downtown culinary options or visit the many reopening restaurants. Only 10 blocks from downtown and 5 blocks from RiNo. Cannabis friendly.

Please note that we do not have a child friendly home and cater to travelers 21 and older only.

The space
Built in the 1890s, this home was part of the first residential expansion of the young city of Denver. Next door was the residence of Colorado's first traveling governor. Jack Kerouac's buddy Neal Cassidy, featured prominently in On the Road, grew up just around the corner.

host_id:

description: Denver Carriage House
host_id:
Welcome to Denver!

description: Eco-Friendly Home - 1% for the Planet Member
host_id:
We are located in the Villa Park neighborhood of Denver and our Airbnb is 1% for the planet. We have planted 10 new trees, 7 of which are fruit trees. The home is powered by solar. To date, the panels have created 595 kWh, which is equivalent to keeping 921 lbs of CO2 out of the atmosphere! We have compost and recycling onsite and encourage all guests to utilize both. We have a regenerative organic garden onsite and are happy to share the bounty.

The space
Private house featuring 2 bedrooms and a newly renovated bathroom. Hardwood floors throughout with tile in the bathroom and carpet in one of the bedrooms. Nest thermostat and nest protect smoke alarm included in home. Garden onsite that we are happy to share our abundance with depending on the time of year. Fenced front yard space. Unfenced backyard space. Chairs and a fire pit available if wanting to hang outside. Kitchen pots, pans, silverware, plates, cups, etc available as well as oil and general spices.

The town house is modern clean and comfortable.

The space
75” smart tv with cable in living room
Comcast cable with all pay channels. You can watch this from a beautiful Italian leather couch or from the cozy dining room table while you have your wine, beer, coffee, etc...
Roku smart tv in bedroom with xfinity beta so you have all the cable channels as well as Netflix sling and Hulu.
Your bed is a firm pillow top mattress with full bed bug proof covers on both mattress and box spring purchased from terminex and washed

Just around the corner from Coors Field! The LoDo neighborhood of Denver features some of the Mile High's hottest restaurants and nightlife. Very easy access to the light rail at Union Station (10-15 min. walk) with direct access to Denver International Airport.

If you've had a long day of hiking or skiing and would prefer to stay in, you're in luck! Uber Eats, Grub hub and ClusterTruck will deliver dinner or dessert from the best restaurants in the city.

description: Wash Park Home Away from Home
host_id:
Take a break from the busy downtown scene in lovely Washington Park - dubbed "Wash Park" by locals. The area is complete with lush landscaping, delicious restaurants, hip bars but also possess a family-friendly atmosphere. Wash Park itself has two lakes, flower gardens, tree-lined paths and seemingly endless expanses of green grass. It's a fitness mecca for Denverites! Nearby is South Pearl Street now home to restaurants, galleries, wine and cocktail bars, specialty shops and boutiques!

The space
The home itself sits across the street from Grasemere Lake. The home has a rustic/modern feel, fully stocked kitchen, two luxurious bedrooms, one spa inspired bathroom, Apple TV/Netflix & a private yard inclusive of a grill! The kitchen is newly updated with top of the line appliances, exposed brick and a breakfast area! The space is cozy 1100 sf. and is perfect for couples, families, friends or solo traveler! description: Historic Baker Bird House
host_id:
Come stay in the cozy historic Baker bird house. It is 1.5 miles south of downtown Denver. The home was built at the end of the 19th century and was remodeled in 2018. There are two guest bedrooms each with a queen bed (9'x11' and 9'x9'). There is an evaporative cooler, window a/c, and two ceiling fans. Free street parking in front of the house. All surfaces (floors, tables, counters), light fixtures and switches, and linens (sheets, comforters, blankets, bath mat, and towels) are cleaned.

The space
The main area is an open living area with two couches, a dining table with six chairs, a breakfast bar with two stools, and a large kitchen. There is a desk and chair for those who need to work and full size washer and dryer. The two queen rooms have an adjoining door but it cannot be opened due to placement of furniture. description: Casa Tejon, Spacious Sunnyside Retreat | Hot Tub
host_id:
Originally constructed in 1911, Casa Tejon is what you get when premium location meets immaculate restoration. Grab a Colorado craft brew, freshly poured from the tap at the wet-bar, and make yourself comfortable inside or under twinkling lights around the gas fire pit in the backyard before heading out to enjoy any of the delicious restaurants in walking distance** With room to spread out and our new hot tub, all you and your family and friends have to do is relax and enjoy yourselves!

The space

Your space is a recently constructed guestroom and bathroom in a building behind our family house. The beds and all of the bathroom stuff are less than 2 years old. Our lot is very big, a 1/2 acre. Guests are free to use the space.

On property, private parking and room for multiple cars if necessary. Private bathroom with shower, and bedroom. Guests also have access to our large backyard, although we use it too.

description: Steck's Roost at Wash Park
host_id:
Steck's Roost at Wash Park is a cozy one bedroom retreat- only 2 blocks from Denver's popular Washington Park and minutes from excellent neighborhood restaurants and shops.

As a family owned business, we are committed to ensuring an outstanding lodging experience for our guests.

The space
From your private patio entrance, you will find a spacious lounge with comfortable furniture featuring a smart tv, and adjoining area in which to enjoy a snack and beverage of your choice. A well-appointed bathroom with thick towels, a hair dryer and cozy shower is just off the nook. You'll snuggle down in the Queen size bed for a relaxing night's rest.

Guest access
The apartment can be accessed to the south of the house main entrance. There are 6 steps down to entrance patio, the security door will have the guest's unique code. The code will be provided with the reservation confirmation.

description: BIG, Beautiful, Bungalow! Near DT! All the EXTRAS!
host_id:
Enjoy a free gift and complimentary breakfast at this recently updated, historic, Four bed, Two bath bungalow with mostly new furniture. Walking distance to the lively Tennyson Street or Regis University, short Uber ride to downtown or Highlands Square. Be in the mountains in the morning (Red Rocks 17 min), and on a golf course, or downtown in the afternoon from this location. Rocky Mountain Lake Park is practically your back yard! The home is perfect for families or great for a group get away.

The space
5 STAR RATING! This home has been featured in The Quilting Company July/Aug issue and housed many musicians who have sold out Red Rocks! Book NOW as our calendar fills up fast! We have a few dates left this month on discounted pricing! Enjoy the luxury of newer furniture, New Colorado artwork from local artists, a large beautiful new table with bench style seating, a new sectional couch, a 420 friendly garage, a 55" 4K TV (additional TV's in 2 rooms), ROKU, HBO

description: Socially Distanced Private Apt. at Wholesome House
host_id:
Welcome to the Wholesome House Cooperative! Stay in a renovated private apartment in our beloved 1902 Denver Square. Many of Denver's top restaurants and bars are within walking distance, and our favorite​​​ coffee shop is right around the corner. This is a perfect place to explore Denver's best neighborhood, and your stay at our co-op supports affordable housing in Denver.

The space
This is a private, downstairs apartment attached to a beautiful historic Denver Square. The seven adults who make up Wholesome House came together to build an intentional community centered around sharing food and building thriving relationships. We have carefully created a private apartment that is cozy and unique.

description: 2 bdrm Private Denver bright & airy 2nd floor apt.
host_id:
This entire second-floor sunny living area in the Central Park (fka Stapleton) neighborhood is the perfect home-base for exploring Denver, recent guests have said it is an amazing value. Exclusive entry through the front door, two bedrooms, a great room, kitchenette, and full bath; in a highly walkable neighborhood near restaurants, groceries, open space, --but not so urban that finding parking is difficult, and only a short drive to downtown Denver.

The space
This sunny second-floor space is perfect for a private retreat while visiting Denver. Includes 2 bedrooms (sleeps 4), kitchenette w/small refrigerator, full bath, and a large living room. You have an exclusive entry; the two living areas of the house are separated by locked French doors on the first floor.

Your main bedroom has a comfortable queen size bed outfitted with 4 down pillows and a down comforter. The second bedroom contains two single beds (also with down comforters and pillows).

description: City Park Den 2 Bed, 1 Bath & Reading Nook
host_id:
City Park Den-Garden level apartment of a craftsman bungalow with a small kitchenette. Centrally located in the historic neighborhood of Whittier. Named after poet and advocate for the abolition of slavery, John Greenleaf Whittier. Steps from the beautiful City Park, City Park Golf Course, Denver Zoo, coffee shops, dinning, bars, and more. Comfortable outdoor space with grill. Close to downtown and everything you need to experience Denver or a scenic drive. 2019-BFN-0002345

*Entrance has steps that may be tricky or inaccessible to those with mobility issues.

host_id:

Recently remodeled, this space offers 12’ high ceilings, original timber beams, expansive windows facing both west & south for incredible natural light, & a contemporary kitchen that serves as a centerpiece to the large, open floor plan. The fully finished downstairs offers a luxurious, spa-like bathroom, 3 bedrooms and a large open entertainment room.

The space
On the main level, you'll find the master bedroom with King sized bed, private bath and large walk in closet. There is also a second bedroom with a lofted space offering a queen bed as well as a pull out queen sofa bed. This bedroom has access to the secondary main level bath.

Downstairs you'll find a large entertaining space along with 3 additional bedrooms each with a queen bed. There is a luxurious, spa like bathroom with large soaking tub and full laundry room.

Welcome to Denver's trendiest neighborhoods! Great restaurants, bars, shops & coffee all around the corner. This modern stay is minutes from downtown, close to 1-70 to head to the mountains & walking distance to great eats!

This home is only a short-walk away from Denver’s lush City Park, the home of the Denver Zoo, and Denver Museum of Nature and Science. You’re just a short transit stop or bike ride from downtown, with it’s shopping and entertainment district, as well as sports and events stadiums and venues.

Granite countertops, high-end stainless steel appliances, and a custom mosaic backsplash make the kitchen in this newly remodeled Victorian style home perfect for entertaining or creating gourmet meals. Lunch at one of the two hip restaurants steps from your door, then explore downtown, the Highlands, or LoHi. If it's mountain adventure you're after, easily hop on the highway and enjoy in the Rocky Mountains within an hour.

Our cozy cottage is fully renovated, brand new everything and perfect for business travelers, a couple or small family. Located in central Denver, across the street from the Cherry Creek trail and 2 blocks away from vibrant 6th Ave restaurants, bars, and coffee (Pablo's). Quick walk to Trader Joe's. We made sure to retain some of its original character like the steel beam mounted on the ceiling for an engine hoist. The space is 600 square feet. Let the memories begin when you step foot inside this dream vacation getaway with an unbeatable location — steps away from the five hottest neighborhoods in Denver. With many ways to stay entertained, your stay is sure to be memorable. Bring the outdoors in, with floor to ceiling french doors, head to the basement for a theater like experience or relax with friends around the oversized kitchen bar. Welcome home to the perfect jumping point for the perfect getaway to the Mile High City.

The space
Bring the outdoors in, with floor to ceiling french doors that let the crisp Denver air flow through the main floor. A large open concept main floor offers dining, cooking, and relaxing all in one room, with plenty of seating for even the largest groups. Extensive bar seating creates a natural gathering point, while dinner cooks on the 5-burner Italian stove, and the morning espresso shots are divvied up among the group.
Ready to settle in for a relaxing movie night?

description: Charming Denver Townhouse close to Downtown!
host_id:
This charming, 1913 Denver row house is found in the up and coming Jefferson Park neighborhood of NW Denver. My home is just steps from a coffee shop, liquor store, pizza place, grocery store, 3 fabulous restaurants and an ice cream shop! You'll have easy access to downtown for all of the attractions and to I-25 for mountain adventures! You get the convenience of city living with the feel of living in a quiet neighborhood.

The space

Congress Park,
Denver Zoo,
Tag Burger,

2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom with multiple beds. In a great downtown neighborhood, close to everything. Note: Kitchenette only has refrigerator / freezer, microwave and sink. Unfortunately no stove top nor oven.

description: Modern Cosmopolitan Home Near Lake & City Fun

Wet bars, including sink, mini-fridge / freezer, etc., in basement media room and loft. Surround sound entertainment system available in basement (along with treadmill). description: Private guest suite in mission-style Denver duplex
host_id:
Bright, clean and renovated private 2 room/1 bath guest basement pad plus outdoor patio with. BBQ in Denver, Colorado.

The space
This recently updated and redecorated private guest basement is all yours and includes a separate bedroom with full size bed, a living room with a convertible sofa, internet TV, a full bath, a breakfast nook/countertop equipped with coffee and tea, mugs, espresso machine, frothier, electric kettle, toaster and mini-fridge (Note: this space is not a kitchen as there is no stove or sink for cooking).

It is about a 2-3 mile drive, bike, scooter or bus to the downtown area and the same or less to other cool Denver spots in 5-Points, Rino, Cap Hill, etc...City Park, Denver Science Museum and the Zoo are in walking distance.

description: Sonder *Monthly Discounts* 2BR Near Natural Grocers
host_id:
Whether you are just getting away for the weekend or looking for an extended stay, we’re committed to creating comfortable experiences for our guests. We offer contact-free check-in and 24/7 virtual support which limits in-person interaction. In addition to following the guidance of the CDC and the World Health Organization, we’re partnering with sanitization experts at the Cleveland Clinic to ensure that all of our cleaning standards follow the advice of leaders in the field. We’ve put safety seals on high-touch items, stocked all spaces with complimentary hand sanitizer, and added social distancing signage in common areas. Each space is carefully designed and run by us, so you’ll always know what to expect.

- Digital check-in
- Professionally cleaned
- 24/7 virtual concierge via text, email, or phone
- Private all-in-one living spaces (ample work space)
- Utilities included (even for longer stays)
- Coffee, fresh towels, and bathroom essentials pro

description: Artisan Victorian | Spacious Backyard | Great Location / Central Air
host_id:
The Artisan Abode is a timeless home located in Denver's beautiful Sunnyside neighborhood, less than 2 miles from Downtown Denver and Coors Field. The quaint space is ideal for families or small groups of friends. We personally love the spacious backyard and unique structure of the home.

Due to recommendations from previous guests, we now have Central A/C to keep our guests cool and comfortable throughout the summer.

The Artisan Abode is a two-story home with three bedrooms and two bathrooms. On the first level, guests will find the living room, dining area, one bedroom, kitchen, one bathroom and laundry area. The second and third bedrooms, as well as the second bathroom can be found upstairs. The second bedroom is a loft placed next to the third bedroom. The second bedroom features a twin bed, while the third bedroom has a queen bed. The space also includes a spacious backyard with a swing, dining area + grill, as well as a parking space.

description: Art Studio Carriage House - Highlands Urban Oasis
host_id:
***See THE SPACE below for information on the new cleaning and vacancy policies we have enacted ***

Working Artist Studio with Steampunk flair in Historic Landmark District of Potter Highlands. Private detached carriage house is plush with lots of light. It sits at the rear of a large inner-city lot behind a primary 1880's Victorian home. Centrally located in Denver's oldest neighborhood. Lyft wait is typically less than 5 minutes, and LODO is 30-40 min walk/10min. ride. Dog friendly Yard

The space

-We clean each room using extensive cleaning checklists
-We provide extra cleaning supplies, so you can clean as you stay

The space

Come stay with us in your completely private bedroom and bathroom, right in the middle of Denver. You can walk out the front door and get anywhere in town in 10 to 15 minutes. There is the Art Museum, the Nature and Science Museum, Coors Field, Pepsi Center, Red Rocks, Fiddlers Green, you name it and we are as centrally located as you can get.

Guest access
Enjoy our front or side patio. The living room has a pool table in it as well as a big screen television. Our kitchen has a keurig coffee maker, make yourself a cup of coffee or tea. If you need to refrigerate any perishables you are more than welcome to use a shelf in our fridge.

description: South Denver Lake Home w/Large Yard & Hammock
host_id:
Escape to the Mile High City in style at this unique 3-bedroom, 2-bath vacation rental home, ‘Two Wolves!’ This home features eclectic decor, a large backyard, hammock, gas grill, and plenty of space for both kids and pets to run and play. Downtown Denver and its many sporting stadiums, breweries, unique neighborhoods, museums, and parks can be found within 10 miles, while over 50 family-friendly attractions - like the Red Rocks Amphitheatre - can all be found within half an hour!

The space
Pet-Friendly | Lake Access | Grill | Private Yard

Featuring homey decor and a large yard for entertaining, ‘Two Wolves’ is the perfect home base for families or friends looking to explore all the nearby Denver attractions!

Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Full Bed | Bedroom 3: Queen Bed

COMMUNITY ACCESS: Lake w/ fishing and boating access, playground, pavilion area, tennis courts
OUTDOOR LIVING: Gas grill, hammock, fenced-in yard, am

description: Urban Getaway close to Downtown Denver and LOHI
host_id:
Urban oasis in the city, close to all the best things Denver has to offer! Just minutes away from your favorite destinations: Downtown Denver (15 min) Pepsi Center (13 min), Aquarium (10 min) and Mile High Sports (10 min) and just 7 minutes to LOHI (Lower Highlands) .
Large outdoor space with large deck has plenty of seating. Enjoy streaming television with Sling, Vudu, and Netflix. Free parking.

Guest access
Guests have access to entire home except for garage. There is ample parking on the street as well as driveway

Guest must be 21 to book a reservation

description: Hiawatha House
host_id:
Cozy 1948 home with eclectic interior and a huge backyard for relaxing and enjoying Denver's amazing weather.

I recently purchased and remodeled this home with the idea of providing a great place to stay for Denver visitors. As this is my house you will find personal touches and affects through out. I truly hope you enjoy your stay at the Hiawatha House!

This truly is a quiet residential neighborhood just minutes away from the sights of the city.

The space
Cheerfully furnished with pops of color and whimsy. These are things I have collected and am excited to share with you in my home.

Guest access
You will have full access to the house and yard.

Other things to note
There is no off street parking, however is is very rare that you cannot park in-front of the house. Please note, April through November there is street sweeping, please be sure to take note of the sweeping days when you arrive.

description: The Timeless Retreat | A Cherry Creek Family Home
host_id:
The Timeless Retreat is a family home on the cusp of the Cherry Creek neighborhood. The neighborhood is a secure, friendly area -- ideal for traveling families. The space is minutes away from the Cherry Creek Shopping Center, Elitch Park, the Denver Botanical Gardens and more. To say the least, the home is centrally located with effortless access to Denver's best eats + activities, as well as public transportation.

The space
Our two story home has four bedrooms and three full bathrooms, as well as a spacious kitchen. The top level of the space features two bedrooms and a full bathroom, as well as a master suite with its own bathroom. The master suite has a plush king bed, perfect for some much needed rest and relaxation. The second bedroom includes a queen bed and a desk. The third bedroom includes one full over full bunk bed. Due to weight restrictions, only one person may sleep in the top bunk.

No better location in Denver!

Walking distance to Cheesman Park, Botanical Gardens, Ogden Theater, Fillmore Theatre, 17th Street brunch spots, Colfax Bars, Civic Center Park, Charlie's. King Soopers and Natural Grocers within walking (short 5 minute drive to Trader Joes). Perfect spot for the Denver experience!! 20 minutes from Red Rocks.

Wonderful quiet, safe building with great neighbors.

description: NEW! Unit in Historic Mansion.  Location! Views!
host_id:
NEW! Amazing fourth floor of historic downtown mansion. Stunning views, light, and huge private porch for enjoying the city, mountains, and sunset views. Large, cozy, old world bedroom with beautiful windows, light, and views. Large dining table and area for enjoying an elegant meal.
Imagine spending evenings on the porch watching the sun set, then walking around the corner to one of many restaurants or bars. Hop on your bike and be at the 16th Street Mall or many museums in minutes.

The space
The large main living room includes a sitting area with comfortable contemporary seating, and a large dining table for 6 for long, leisurely dinners. French doors open to the room from a small patio on that side to bring in light and air. The bedroom is a large, beautiful room with large closets and dressers, and seating as well. A pull out queen bed is available in the large sitting room, for two more guests. Lots of space for four people to enjoy a fun trip

description: The Colfax Speakeasy
host_id:
The Colfax Speakeasy is a beautifully restored historic Victorian home located in the heart of central downtown Denver. Originally built in the 1880’s by locally famous architects : Balcomb & Rice for one of Denver’s most prolific civic leaders and entrepreneurs: Barney Lancelot Ford.
This home holds a truly unique experience in one of the most original and exciting parts of the city and close-in proximity to the best restaurants, hottest areas, and major attractions that Denver has to offer.

The space
The house is filled with unique art and eclectic decor with a very inviting feel.
Relax in the Speakeasy Parlor and listen to any of your favorite songs on a 1962 German Grundig Console stereo connected to “Alexa” for an audiophile worthy music experience.
Dine with family and friends at the 100 yr old imported English Oak table and buffet.
Cook gourmet meals in the chef’s kitchen on the custom butcher block from 1950’s NYC.

Come take a walk on the Sunnyside!

Modern, spacious ground-level suite with private entry, king size bed, bathroom w/ large shower, walk-in closet, workspace, & basic kitchenette.

Located on the border of Sunnyside & LoHi, with easy access to scenic rooftops & favorites like Avanti & the famous Little Man Ice Cream. Or venture to RiNo to admire street art, relax with local microbrews at Ratio Beerworks or First Draft, & indulge in the tastiest tapas at creative eateries like SuperMegaBien.

The space
Whether you're visiting for work or play, blackout blinds and a white noise machine ensure a refreshing night's sleep.

Currently, there is some construction noise, mostly during the week due to a construction site across the street. Noise levels can vary from none at all to loud noises, but the white noise machine is effective at drowning out most noise.

description: Whitter historic hideout
host_id:
Experience the best of the Mile High City when you stay at this 1-bedroom over garage suite with private entrance. This space is centrally located to everything Denver has to offer. Stroll through City Park, Historic neighbors, take in a Colorado Rockies game, or browse the shops on 16th street mall, all within 2 miles of the home.

The space
This is an over garage suite in the back of the main house. Down the stairs key less also private entrance bath, laundry, and shared kitchen (you will have an in room fridge so please leave the one in the kitchen to the other guest or owner).

description: Denver Getaway with private hot tub!
host_id:
One block away from Santa Fe and as close as you can get to route 6, this 2 story house is perfect for vacationers, convention center visitors, or mountain explorers! You are booking a 3 bedroom house with 2 bathrooms. The house has a private backyard porch with a hot tub and a private garage gym (not the fanciest but it works!). TVs come with Netflix + HBO!
Please note that we do not recommend this home for families - it is best suited for adults.
The home itself was built in the 1800s - it is very charming and historic in its own way - make sure to scroll through the photos!

The space
Our space is perfect for comfort and relaxation. Brand new couches, bed and TV mean that this space will feel like home. We have a kitchen, private backyard, with night lighting and grill, and private gym access if you want to keep up with your workout routine while on the road.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire house.

description: Executive Lowry Townhouse
host_id:
Quiet gated townhouse community near Lowry Town Center and Cherry Creek Shopping district, this contemporary townhouse sits steps away from the Highline Canal trail with private/security gated system where you can bike/run/ or stroll throughout the city. Separate TV-sitting room with office space and attached 1 car garage. Just 4 miles to Cherry Creek Mall , 7 Miles to Downtown Denver and 5 miles to Anschutz Medical Campus.

The space
Comfortable Townhouse in a unique secluded area within the city limits of Denver. If you are lucky, you can view deer walking on the Highline Canal in nearby Historical Fairmount cemetery during your bike ride!

Guest access
Entire unit.

description: Modern Denver Home in Congress Park
host_id:
Modern remodel of an early 20th century home in the heart of Congress Park, Denver. Just moments away from all the excitement of Colfax and only a few blocks from the Botanical Gardens. Cherry Creek and Downtown Denver are also at your fingertips via a short bike/scooter or car ride.

The space
The house is 3 bedrooms and can accommodate up to 6 adults. However, the 3rd bedroom is a children's room and so we recommend no more than 4 adults and no more than 3 children under the age of 8. We can be flexible with the sleeping arrangements so please message us for more details. If you have specific needs for kids items during your stay, let us know as we can easily provide most items to help make the home more family friendly. The home has a great indoor outdoor backyard space equipped with an outdoor grilling/seating area as well as a hot tub. There is parking available as well.

description: The Denver Gem in Ruby Hill (hot tub! 420-ok!)
host_id:
Whether you are here for an event, 420, the music & art scene, bar-hopping, exploring nature, or hitting the hills for a ski/ride sesh, or for work the Denver Gem is centrally located between the most major reasons people visit Denver. In just 15 minutes in any direction you can be Downtown, Red Rocks Amphitheater, DTC. Close, but far enough from the ruckus to have a quiet, good night sleep so you are fully rejuvenated for the next day’s adventure. Tip: Enjoy ultra relaxation in the hot tub.

The space
Enjoy your own private ~800 sq ft basement level apartment in my primary residence in Ruby Hill neighborhood of Denver. Private entrance with keyless self-entry.

Included in the space there are 2 bedrooms with 2 comfortable queen beds (1 memory foam, 1 beauty rest) and 1 surprisingly plush and comfortable convertible sofa bed that easily folds down into a full size bed in your units living room. This unit has 1 bathroom, a kitchenette, and laundry area.

description: Sunnyside Up Apartment
host_id:
The space
Newly built addition to a classic Victorian home creates a 1 bedroom basement apartment located in the trendy Sunnyside neighborhood of Denver. The apartment features an open living, dining and kitchen area with a queen size sofa sleeper and TV. description: Updated Hilltop Gem - Entire Home
host_id:
The perfect location for your Denver vacation! Close to almost everything but located in the quiet, safe Hilltop/Crestmoor neighborhood - one of the most desirable neighborhoods in Denver. Walking distance to food, grocery, coffee, and ice cream(!), as well as Crestmoor park. Only one mile from the popular Cherry Creek North shopping area, and 10 minutes from downtown.

The space

The space
Rich in history and rustic charm - built in 1896 by one of the leading entrepreneurs of the Colorado Gold Rush, and founder of one of the first gold mines still in operation. A subsequent owner was one of the founders of the National Western Stock Show. Take a step back in time, yet with all the modern amenities: AC unit in second floor, in-house washer & dryer, hot tub, dishwasher.

host_id:
This third floor residential loft, located in the historic Highland District, offers you the best of city living in a trendy neighborhood setting. The oversized balcony, living room, and master bedroom share remarkable, unimpeded views of the Downtown Denver skyline. The amenities of this loft are aplenty, including an open floor plan, large bay windows w/ sliding glass doors to the private outdoor living space, well-equipped kitchen, a large walk-in master closet, a shared workout room and hot tub... and, more.

LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! Lower Highlands (LoHi) has its own unique character exhibited by its mix of older and modern architecture, innovative restaurants, and amazing views of Highland Bridge and Downtown Denver. You can walk to many area attractions. Denver also has a bike rental program called B cycle, which is great for neighborhoods like LoHi. description: The Galapago Gallery | Comfy Colorado Convenience
host_id:
Located just south of downtown Denver, the Galapago Gallery is within walking distance of the Santa Fe Art District as well as all the hip sights and sounds of South Broadway. Built in 1888, this colorful rowhouse features the perfect combination of comfort, style, and location. Situated right in the middle of the Baker neighborhood, the Galapago Gallery is close to parks, boutiques, food, music, brewpubs, dancing, and the South Platte River. Colorful Colorado is all right at your doorstep!

The space
When you walk into the Galapago Gallery, you walk into your own private art show in an 1888 rowhouse. The wide variety of building materials blends perfectly to create an environment of upbeat comfort. Although you are literally surrounded by hundreds of activities at this incredible location, the great room of the Galapago Gallery beckons and lures you inside.
Once in the living room, lounge on the super-comfy sofa and watch your favorite show on the Smart TV.

host_id:
This house is on one of the best blocks in Baker and it is a 130 years old house. This is a small apartment in the home with a separate entrance, clean, quiet, with a comfortable bed and a great shower. If you are not familiar with Baker, it is an exciting neighborhood. It is a little like San Francisco with restaurants, bars, vintage shops, electric scooters everywhere and convenient public transportation.

The space
This apartment is located in a 130 year old house in one of Denver's best neighborhoods. We're a vibrant area with more to offer than you can imagine, and a perfect location for sightseeing in town or as a jumping off point for a trip into the Rockies. The space is larger than the photos make it look, perfect for a solo traveler or couple visiting Denver. We offer free wifi, complimentary tea and coffee, and greet each guest with a loaf of homemade breakfast bread.

host_id:

Recently remodeled, this lower level suite is a fresh, clean and comfortable place to rest and relax. It’s also a great “home base” from which one may easily explore all that Denver has to offer – fabulous restaurants, hip bars, historic sites, museums, and access to hiking, rafting, skiing and more.

Our laundry room is adjacent to your private space. The microwave, mini-refrigerator, utility sink, washer and dryer are available to you. If you are staying longer than a week, then we may coordinate with you a day and timeframe when we may use the washer & dryer. For the most part, we will not need to access the laundry room during your stay.

This updated second floor unit has large picture windows providing lots of natural light all year round. The additional office den makes this a great space for someone in town for extended work travel.

You will be located 1 block from a grocery store, many of Denvers top bars/restaurants, and public transit stops so you'll have no problem finding everything you'd need to make the most of your trip to Denver.

Guests will have 1 covered parking space and laundry on site. There is a small gym for guests to use with a treadmill, elliptical, bike, and free weights. A bike room is available for guests to keep their bikes in.

In a normal year, the hostel was a community space where you could meet new people and be social. In this unprecedented year, we offer a clean, safe space to explore downtown Denver From.

11th Avenue Hostel is more than 100 years old, and focuses on providing community-driven accommodations for world travelers. Please note: the building does not currently have a lift. Our 24/7 staff is happy to help you with your bags. We are also currently upgrading our facilities.

Newly renovated and furnished Park Hill Home in a Quadplex. 2 bedrooms with Queen and Full beds comfortably sleeps 4 adults. Unit includes 1 full bathroom, kitchen with cooking essentials and one very large living and dining room. On site parking. Home has its own front and rear entrances. Upstairs unit with tons of natural light. Perfect for temporary or contract employees, or people moving to Denver looking for a clean, furnished home for short term to temporary stays. Welcome home!

The space
This newly renovated unit (January 2020) has new paint, carpet and all new appliances including microwave, cooking range and stove, fridge, dishwasher and its own full size washer and dryer. Home has all the essentials you'll need for a comfortable short or long term stay including: high speed internet, 40" HDTV with Roku (Amazon Prime, Netflix), office desk and plenty of extra blankets, extra sheets, towels, etc. Just bring your clothes and personal belongings!

host_id:

No smoking cigarettes inside just pot. My place is 11 minutes (3.4 Miles) from downtown, 23 minutes or 14 miles from Red Rocks amphitheater, 20 minutes or 13 miles from Dicks sporting goods Park, 11 min or 7 miles from Coors Field, 9 min or three miles to Sports Authority Field at Mile High, My place is mainly for pot tourism.

Guest access
There is a large shared courtyard to smoke and relax in. There is also a back door with a small space to smoke cigarettes. A laundry room on the northwest corner of building with some workout equipment in it.

description: Spacious and modern corner penthouse apartment.
host_id:
Spacious and modern corner penthouse apartment in the heart of Denver. This apartment is in the coveted Union Station neighborhood, just steps away from music venues, restaurants, bars, and much more. The condo boasts two balconies with full mountain views as well as views of the city and baseball stadiums. When you walk into the apartment you are welcomed with a state of the art kitchen, two bedrooms, two full bathrooms, vaulted ceilings, floor to ceiling windows and amazing furnishings.

The space
High end chic penthouse apartment boasts two balconies overlooking Union Station and Downtown Denver perfect for sunset views. With industrial modern finishes and beautiful open floor plan space is unmatched.

Guest access
Guests have full access to all areas of the condo including two balconies, two full bathrooms, two bedrooms and an incredible kitchen.

description: Loft and private bedroom in shared house
host_id:
This four story row home is a little over a mile from Dick's Sporting Goods Park, situated between the Airport and Downtown. It sits across the street from a beautiful neighborhood park, in Northfield Stapleton.

Built in 2016, this home has hotel quality white linens, a chef's dream kitchen, and stunning views of the Rocky Mountains and Downtown Denver. With a patios, roof top deck, and living space this is the perfect location for your getaway!

The space
The main floor has the shared living room, dinning space, kitchen, and the half bath. The Living room has a 75” TV over a gas fireplace and a huge sofa bed. There is a patio off the living room that leads Bosh appliances and all the spices a condiments you could possibly need for your stay.

The laundry room is also on this floor and contains an extra large washer and dryer.

The third floor has a guest room with a queen sized bed . The third floor has a full bathroom with shower.

Quiet neighborhood close to Mile High Stadium, Sloan's Lake and just outside of downtown Denver. description: Old School renovated Denver Liquor Store!
host_id:
Loft style space in the old Cut Rate Liquor store, built in 1874 but completely renovated. Just outside the Central Business district and accessible to more than you'd believe, in a very urban setting. The location is unreal. Busy, amazing old school Denver. Two outside living spaces, a roof deck with chairs and a propane firepit and a small front patio with umbrellas and a table/chairs. The building is ugly outside/super non descript, you'd never believe what's inside.

The space
This is a triplex with long term neighbors. This is my personal home, but I travel a lot and basically live out of a backpack and stay with my gf a fair amount, so my stuff will be put away and it'll be professionally cleaned before you arrive. No parties or weird stuff are allowed, sorry. Read that again please. There are two other attached units with amazing people renting them. If you aren't reasonably quiet and a decent human, I'm going to enjoy my time with you very much. Good revie

description: Modern Charming Bungalow

description: Spacious 1 bedroom w/pool & gym near Union Station
host_id:
Beautiful apartment in the heart of LoDo (downtown) with private outdoor patio looking out towards Union Station.

The space
Contact me for special offers for monthly stays!!

The apartment is in a secure building with a concierge. There is a large bedroom with a queen bed, a comfy sofa that can sleep an extra person in the living room, full kitchen, full bathroom with tub and washer dryer in the unit. The building has a rooftop pool, gym and "game room" with a pool table. Union Station is right across the street so you can take the light rail in from the airport. Right in the heart of downtown, you'll be directly across the street from Whole Foods and steps away from a ton of amazing bars and restaurants in downtown and across the bridge from LoHi (lower highlands). Coors Field is a few blocks away and the Pepsi Center is only a few mins drive, 20 min walk.

Guest access
The whole apartment is all yours!

description: Historic Wash Park home two blocks from the park
host_id:
Historic home walking distance to Washington Park and delicious restaurants! Home has beautiful backyard complete with trampoline, treehouse, fire pit, hammock, homemade baseball field, and lots of sitting areas to relax and unwind. It was built in 1910 and has been completed remodeled while keeping the character of a hundred year old home. It’s conveniently located three miles from downtown Denver so there are plenty of things to do!

The space
Our home is your home! Yes, we do live here so we have family pictures on the wall and if you open cabinets you’ll see our things, but while you’re here, we want you to feel comfortable and enjoy your stay so you are welcome to all of our space!

Guest access
You have access to our entire home!

Other things to note
We also have a Traegger grill in the backyard that is yours to enjoy during your visit!

description: Modern Luxury Home in the Heart of Denver
host_id:
Modern home located in Denver's art district featuring a rooftop patio with a gas fire pit and views of the city/local murals. Cook and entertain at home in this beautiful kitchen, or dine at some of the best local restaurants just steps away. Stay in the neighborhood or enjoy a quick walk or scooter ride over to LoDo, the Highlands, City Park or the local sports arenas.

The space
This beautiful modern home is located downtown, which means you are in the perfect place to explore Denver! Its large windows fill the space with natural light and the perfect way to watch the snow falling in the winter months. The biggest attraction though, is the rooftop where you can host a happy hour, roast marshmallows, watch the sunset and cuddle up around a fire, or do rooftop yoga, all while taking in views of the city. If going out doesn't interest you, cuddle up in our luxury beds.

description: Warm & Cozy Half-Duplex Bungalow
host_id:
Cozy and charming half-duplex bungalow style home in one of Denver's trendiest areas! Located in LoHi/Sunnyside neighborhood, home is in an active community that is walking distance to shops, restaurants, breweries, and a short 5 minute car ride to downtown.

The space
- Keys located in lockbox
- Private front door and side door entrance
- Absolutely NO CIGARETTE SMOKE INSIDE
- No pets
- Downtown Denver is a quick 5-10 minute Uber/Lyft ride
- Red Rocks Amphitheater is a 25 minute drive
- 5 minutes from I-70, which is takes you to the mountains to hikes or to ski/snowboard
- Free street parking and off-street parking
- Outdoor front and side yard to enjoy the sunshine
- Youtube TV (like cable), Netflix, and HBOnow

Guest access
The whole half-duplex will be yours.

description: Fully furnished carriage house in heart of RiNo!
host_id:
Charming, cozy, modern! Newly furnished 1886 historic carriage house in Five Points - Denver’s oldest neighborhood. 2 bed/1 bath.

Located near Mestizo-Curtis Park and a quick walk to RiNo and Five Points bars, breweries, restaurants and venues. Experience this lively district known for its artistry from the perfect little house that you'll have all to yourself.

We are taking every precaution to make your stay safe for everyone with contactless check-in, and rigorous cleaning/disinfecting.

The space
Hotel quality with all the comfort and amenities of home.

Features:
-New bathroom w/ rain shower, heated floors, fresh linens.
-Washer and dryer.
-Exposed brick walls and modern decor.
-Fully equipped kitchen with all new appliances, coffee station, comfy breakfast nook.
-Living room with large couch and flat-screen TV (Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime available).

host_id:

Modern, bright and beautifully decorated, with gorgeous high ceilings, large windows and it's own private deck. Just minutes away from Berkeley's popular Tennyson Street, Highlands Square and Downtown Denver, the guest house has everything you need. Full kitchen, queen bed, sofa bed, wash/dry, parking and more.
